content.question: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim regarding how Vang uses contrasts to convey the complex relationships among the members of the speaker’s family.

frqParts.text: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim regarding how Vang uses contrasts to convey the complex relationships among the members of the speaker’s family.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
